shortcuts.title: Action ribbon
shortcuts.description: Provide a common, dynamic region for user actions and feedback which applies to a subset of the UI.

shortcuts.title: Alert
shortcuts.description: Notification informing users about important information or events.

shortcuts.title: Button
shortcuts.description: Common buttons prompt most actions in a UI.

shortcuts.title: Checkbox
shortcuts.description: Allows the user to select one or more options from a set of choices.

shortcuts.title: Dialog
shortcuts.description: Modal window prompting users for input or displaying critical information.

shortcuts.title: Radio
shortcuts.description: Allows the user to select a single option from a set of mutually exclusive choices.

shortcuts.title: Select
shortcuts.description: Allows the user to choose from a list of options presented in a collapsible format

shortcuts.title: Text field
shortcuts.description: Allows users to type text into a form.
